testsuite.name: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: And I choose creating new lesson in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: And Lesson Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: And I enter valid information for the lesson "Lesson Test"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: And I click the new slideshow button on the lesson design page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: And I enter valid information for the question name as "Lesson Test Slideshow"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: And I see the ckeditor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: And I set the duration to "20" seconds
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: And I save & close the slideshow on the design page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: And I save & close the lesson on the design page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: And I see summary of the lesson
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: And I save and close the lesson summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: And I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: And I click on the "Lesson Test" module in the "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: Then the module "Lesson Test" is opened without launch page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: And I clear the console logs
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: When I begin playback of the Slideshow
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: Then I see no errors in the console
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: When I pause playback of the Slideshow
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: Then I see no errors in the console
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: When I resume playback of the Slideshow
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow

testcase.name: Then I see no errors in the console
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully record analytics for a Pause/Resume event on a slideshow
